name: UpdateTaskRunStatus
description:
Update the status of a specific task run.

Use this tool to update details of a specific task run within a project. Suitable for changing statuses or executing minor updates on task executions.

parameters.name: task_run_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the specific task run to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this task run.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve via /api/projects/ if unknown.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: task_run_task_identifier
parameters.description: The unique task ID for identifying the specific task run to update. This ID is associated with the task execution.

parameters.name: task_run_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details to update a task run, including id, task, stage, branch, status, log, error_message, output, state, and timestamps.

log.description: Live output from Claude Code execution

output.description: Run output data (e.g., PR URL, commit SHA, etc.)

state.description: Run state data for resuming or tracking execution state

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this task run.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this task run.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

log.description: Live output from Claude Code execution

output.description: Run output data (e.g., PR URL, commit SHA, etc.)

state.description: Run state data for resuming or tracking execution state
